item.title: Journey of my Home Server
item.description: I had a couple of Raspberry Pi 3 (a credit card size SBC) with me, and I wanted to build something to satisfy my DIY spirit in me. If you search on the Internet, everyone will suggest you build a Home Server ðŸ˜„ I had also recently replaced all the old HDD in home computers with SSDs, which means the systems were substantially fast now but had low storage capacity. So the project of building a NAS or Home Server was a good fit for my home.
